/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is teeming with vehicles, including cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the image. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. In the distance, a highway overpass stretches across the frame, hinting at the city's extensive infrastructure. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are muted, with shades of gray and green dominating the palette.
